00010 // Check against redundant including
00011 #ifndef TT_BUFFER_RECORD_H
00012 #define TT_BUFFER_RECORD_H
00013 
00014 // Include appropriate headers
00015 #include "tt_audio_base.h"
00016 #include "tt_buffer.h"
00017 
00018 
00019 /********************************************************
00020         CLASS INTERFACE/IMPLEMENTATION
00021 
00022         The entire class is implemented inline for speed.
00023  ********************************************************/
00024 
00025 class tt_buffer_record:public tt_audio_base{
00026 
00027         private:
00028                 // Function pointer for the DSP Loop (use this instead of branching for speed)
00029                 typedef void (tt_buffer_record::*FuncPtr)(tt_audio_signal *);
00030                 FuncPtr dsp_executor;
00031                 
00032                 // Attribute Values
00033                 tt_attribute_value_discrete     mode;
00034                 tt_attribute_value_discrete             record;
00035                 tt_attribute_value_discrete             loop;
00036                 
00037                 tt_buffer                                               *my_buffer;
00038                 unsigned long                                   index;
00039         
00040         
00041         public:
00042                 enum selectors{                                                                         // Attribute Selectors
00043                         k_mode,
00044                                 k_mode_fadein,
00045                                 k_mode_direct,
00046                         k_record,
00047                         k_loop,
00048                 };
00049                 
00050 
00051                 // OBJECT LIFE                                  
00052                 tt_buffer_record()                                                                      // Constructor          
00053                 {
00054                         // set defaults
00055                         set_attr(k_mode, k_mode_direct);
00056                         set_attr(k_record, 0);
00057                         set_attr(k_loop, 0);
00058                         my_buffer = 0;
00059                 }
00060 
00061                 tt_buffer_record(tt_buffer *buffer_ref)                 // Constructor - BUFFER ARG
00062                 {
00063                         // set defaults
00064                         set_attr(k_mode, k_mode_direct);
00065                         set_attr(k_record, 0);
00066                         set_attr(k_loop, 0);
00067                         my_buffer = 0;
00068                         set_buffer(buffer_ref);
00069                 }
00070 
00071                 ~tt_buffer_record()                                                             // Destructor
00072                 {
00073                         ;
00074                 }
00075 
00076 
00077                 // ATTRIBUTES
00078                 void set_attr(tt_selector sel, tt_attribute_value val)  // Set Attributes
00079                 {
00080                         switch (sel){
00081                                 case k_mode:    // mode sets a function pointer to the correct dsp loop
00082                                         mode = (tt_attribute_value_discrete)val;
00083                                         if(mode == k_mode_direct)
00084                                                 dsp_executor = &tt_buffer_record::dsp_vector_calc_direct;
00085                                         else if(mode == k_mode_fadein)
00086                                                 dsp_executor = &tt_buffer_record::dsp_vector_calc_fadein;
00087                                         break;
00088                                 case k_record:
00089                                         record = (tt_attribute_value_discrete)val;
00090                                         index = 0;              // Set back to the beginning of the buffer
00091                                         break;
00092                                 case k_loop:
00093                                         loop = (tt_attribute_value_discrete)val;
00094                                         break;
00095                         }
00096                 }
00097 
00098                 tt_attribute_value get_attr(tt_selector sel)                            // Get Attributes
00099                 {
00100                         switch (sel){
00101                                 case k_mode:
00102                                         return mode;
00103                                 default:
00104                                         return 0.0;
00105                         }
00106                 }
00107 
00108 
00109                 // METHODS
00110                 void set_buffer(tt_buffer *buffer_ref)  // Set Buffer
00111                 {
00112                         my_buffer = buffer_ref; 
00113                 }
00114 
00115                 tt_buffer *get_buffer()                         // Get Buffer
00116                 {
00117                         return my_buffer;
00118                 }
00119                 
00120 
00121                 /*****************************************************
00122                  * DSP LOOPS
00123                  *****************************************************/
00124                 
00125                 // Publically exposed interface for this object's dsp routine
00126                 void dsp_vector_calc(tt_audio_signal *in)
00127                 {
00128                         (*this.*dsp_executor)(in);
00129                 }
00130 
00131         private:
00132                 // DSP LOOP: direct (no fade in)
00133                 void dsp_vector_calc_direct(tt_audio_signal *in)
00134                 {
00135                         temp_vs = in->vectorsize;
00136                     while(temp_vs--){
00137                                 // locate the play head, range check
00138                                 if(record == 0) return;
00139                                 
00140                                 my_buffer->contents[index++] = *in->vector++;   // Write to the buffer
00141                                 
00142                                 if(index >= my_buffer->length_samples){
00143                                         index = 0;                              
00144                                         if(loop == 0)
00145                                                 record = 0;
00146                                 }
00147                     }
00148                     in->reset();
00149                 }
00150                 
00151                 // DSP LOOP: fade in
00152                 void dsp_vector_calc_fadein(tt_audio_signal *in)
00153                 {
00154                         temp_vs = in->vectorsize;
00155                     while(temp_vs--){
00156                                 *in->vector++;// ********************* NOT YET IMPLEMENTED ************************
00157                     }
00158                     in->reset();
00159 
00160                 }
00161                 
00162 };
00163 
00164 #endif  // tt_BUFFER_RECORD_H
